title: 12. Is America Ready for a "No-Lose Lottery"?
description: For the most part, Americans don't like the simple, boring act of putting money in a savings account. We do, however, love to play the lottery. So what if you combined the two, creating a new kind of savings account with a lottery payout?
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
content:encoded: For the most part, Americans don't like the simple, boring act of putting money in a savings account. We do, however, love to play the lottery. So what if you combined the two, creating a new kind of savings account with a lottery payout?
